bill_title: Honoring ,commending, and thanking South Dakota Highway Patrol Trooper Greg Dirk upon his retirement for his many dedicated years of service to South Dakotans as a highway patrolman.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring ,commending, and thanking South Dakota Highway Patrol Trooper Greg Dirk upon his retirement for his many dedicated years of service to South Dakotans as a highway patrolman. WHEREAS, Trooper Greg Dirk, with the generous support of his family, served South Dakotans with selfless dedication to their safety; and WHEREAS, the actions, performance, and tenure of Trooper Greg Dirk are in keeping with the highest traditions of the South Dakota Highway Patrol: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors, commends, and thanks South Dakota Highway Patrol Trooper Greg Dirk for his outstanding career commitment and service to the citizens of South Dakota.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring ,commending, and thanking South Dakota Highway Patrol Trooper Greg Dirk upon his retirement for his many dedicated years of service to South Dakotans as a highway patrolman. WHEREAS, Trooper Greg Dirk, with the generous support of his family, served South Dakotans with selfless dedication to their safety; and WHEREAS, the actions, performance, and tenure of Trooper Greg Dirk are in keeping with the highest traditions of the South Dakota Highway Patrol: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors, commends, and thanks South Dakota Highway Patrol Trooper Greg Dirk for his outstanding career commitment and service to the citizens of South Dakota. 100 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
